#List of IP addresses used by Blizzard services
#https://ipinfo.io/AS57976
#Info @ https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/sc2/t/how-to-put-in-ports-number-for-blizzard-games/7533/2
#TCP Ports - 80, 443, 1119, 1120, 3074, 3724, 4000, 6112-6120, 27014-27050
#UDP Ports - 80, 443, 1119, 1120, 3478-3479, 3724, 4000, 4379-4380, 5060, 5062, 6112-6119, 6250, 27000-27031, 27036, 12000-64000

#Many of the ports are repeated in this list. I have yet to test what type of traffic (for APP ID) is transmittet through what port.
#XBOX and PS 4 ports will remain untested by me, but I will update if I get feedback from others.
#TCP 53, 80, 443 are common ports, remember this when making no-decrypt policy for blizzard (order of rules)

#Blizzard Battle.net desktop app
#TCP 80, 443, 1119
#UDP 80, 443, 1119

#Blizzard Voice Chat
#TCP 80, 443, 1119
#UDP 3478-3479, 5060, 5062, 6250, 12000-64000

#Blizzard Downloader
#TCP & UDP 1119, 1120, 3724, 4000, 6112, 6113, 6114

#Diablo
#TCP & UDP 6112-6119

#Diablo II
#TCP 6112 & 4000 
#UDP None

#Diablo III
#TCP 80, 1119
#UDP 1119, 6120

#Hearthstone
#TCP & UDP 1119, 3724

#Heroes of the Storm
#TCP 80, 443, 1119-1120, 3724, 6113
#UDP 80, 1119-1120, 3478-3479, 3724, 5060, 5062, 6113, 6250, 12000-64000

#Overwatch
#TCP 1119, 3724, 6113, 80
#UDP 3478-3479, 5060, 5062, 6250, 12000-64000

#StarCraft
#TCP & UDP 6112

#StarCraft II
#TCP & UDP 1119, 6113, 1120, 80, 3724

#Warcraft II Battle.net Edition
#TCP & UDP 6112-6119

#Warcraft III
#TCP 6112 (Default) and 6113-6119
#UDP None

#World of Warcraft
#TCP & UDP 3724, 1119, 6012

#Call of Duty: Black Ops 4	
#TCP PC 3074, 27014-27050
#TCP PlayStation 4 80, 443, 1935, 3478-3480
#TCP XBox One 53, 80, 3074
#UDP PC 3478, 4379-4380, 27000-27031, 27036
#UDP PlayStation 4 3478-3479
#UDP XBox One 53, 88, 500, 3074, 3075, 3544, 4500

#Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
#TCP PC 3074, 27014-27050
#TCP PlayStation 4 80, 443, 1935, 3478-3480
#TCP XBox One 53, 80, 3074
#UDP PC 3074, 3478, 4379-4380, 27000-27031, 27036
#UDP PlayStation 4 3074, 3478-3479
#XBox One 53, 88, 500, 3074, 3075, 3544, 4500

#FQDN
#TBD
